assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Cystic_Fibrosis_Mutation_Renewal_Assessment_Expected_Outcomes_Q1_R1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Please indicate the latest sweat chloride test. Sweat chloride should decrease below 60 mmol/litre or by at least 30% from baseline. If baseline levels are lower than 60 mmol/litre, a decrease by at least 30% or sustained absolute improvement in FEV1 â‰¥ 5% should be observed.
